A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A sad moment for all Star Wars fans as this episode becomes instantly mockable.

Some really poor judgement calls from the director for this one as blunder and error combine with the worst Star Wars script to date and some pretty ridiculous events.

Star Wars fans are rightly angry at this movie as it strips away all the emotional connection and leaves us with something akin to a cheap Game Of Thrones style deaths mixed with Transformers like vacuous action scenes.

Very poor indeed.
